column4: I get delay on my typing some times(now).. is this a known problem and what can i do abut it? (after pushing a key it takes time for it to show up)
is your hdd swapping at the time of the lag?
the delay is on every type...
how much RAM do you have?
dosnt stop before I do a relog
im not running any heavy programs.. my swap is 8 giggggg
hmmm. usually input lag is caused by system resources being maxed out. is there a runaway process somewhere? Did you configure swap manually?
what's top have to say about load average, mem use, swap use, and cpu use?
CPU is at 5% and 7% ~ mem is 15% stable swa 0.1% stable
hmmm. the only other thing I can think of is perhaps an X issue, or video driver... Does input work in avirtual terminal -- ie Ctrl+Alt+f1?
then I'm thinking more of an X or vid driver, but other than that, I dunno.
had to relog.. couldnt take it anymore :P
I think Im gonna do a clean install of ubuntu.. guess I did some mistakes earlier... thx for trying tho :)
